mean_en: calm emotions when dealing with problems or pressure
word_etyma: equ相等 + anim思想 + ity名词后缀 → equanimity 沉着
short_phrase: maintain his equanimity while she yells at him
sentence: Even while she screamed at him, he maintained his composure and equanimity.
sentence_trans: 即使在她对着他吼叫的时候，他还是保持冷静沉着。
